full_text: Case 1:19-cr-00830-AT Document 60 Filed 07/29/21 Page 1 of 1 U.S. Department of Justice United States Attorney Southern District of New York The Silvio J. Mollo Building One Saint Andrew's Plaza New York, New York 10007 July 29, 2021 By ECF Honorable Analisa Torres United States District Judge Southern District of New York Daniel Patrick Moynihan United States Courthouse 500 Pearl Street New York, New York 10007 Re: United States v. Tova Noel et al., 19 Cr. 830 (AT) Dear Judge Torres: Please be advised that I am leaving the United States Attorney's Office for other employment. Accordingly, please remove me as counsel of record in the above-captioned case. Thank you very much for the Court's consideration. Respectfully submitted, AUDREY STRAUSS United States Attorney by: Jessica Lonergan Assistant United States Attorney (212) 637-1038 cc: Counsel of Record (by ECF) DOJ-OGR-00022140

text_blocks.content: United States Attorney Southern District of New York
The Silvio J. Mollo Building One Saint Andrew's Plaza New York, New York 10007 July 29, 2021
Honorable Analisa Torres United States District Judge Southern District of New York Daniel Patrick Moynihan United States Courthouse 500 Pearl Street New York, New York 10007
Re: United States v. Tova Noel et al., 19 Cr. 830 (AT)

Dear Judge Torres: Please be advised that I am leaving the United States Attorney's Office for other employment. Accordingly, please remove me as counsel of record in the above-captioned case. Thank you very much for the Court's consideration.
Respectfully submitted, AUDREY STRAUSS United States Attorney
by: Jessica Lonergan Assistant United States Attorney (212) 637-1038

additional_notes: The document is a letter from the United States Attorney's Office to Judge Analisa Torres, informing her that the attorney is leaving the office and requesting to be removed as counsel of record in the case United States v. Tova Noel et al. The letter is signed by Jessica Lonergan, Assistant United States Attorney.
